content.webTitle: CD: Pop review: Robert Wyatt & Bertrand Burgalat, This Summer Night

fields.headline: Pop review: Robert Wyatt & Bertrand Burgalat, This Summer Night
fields.bodyText: This ear-catching collaboration with French composer/producer Burgalat serves as a trailer for the forthcoming reissue of Wyatt's back catalogue. The A-side's wonky electro-pop would not have been out of place at a mid-Eighties Red Wedge disco, but the Hot Chip remix takes the whole thing apart and puts it back together with a finesse worthy of disco maestro Walter Gibbons.
